misc.content: proxdxd03's official webpage was launched! You will be informed about upcoming releases, concerts and other special events here! The page is run using GitHub Pages btw.

release.content: The first pre-single of the planned album "Photon", "Funk You All", is going to be released to all platforms on March 11th, 2023. Listen to it then!

release.cap: Single "Funk You All" released! Listen on all platforms now!
release.content: The single "Funk You All" is now available on Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, YouTube Music and Amazon Music! Get vibing to the chill bass melodies, have fun and don't forget to save it to your playlists and library to listen again later!

The time is going fast... proxdxd03's next pre-release of "Photon", "Absentia" was just finished up and is planned to be available starting April 1st, 2023. It will also feature two remixes. Again, the great cover was created by ShatteredReaIity! Stay tuned!
